title: Azhagana Ratchashiyae Song Lyrics Mudhalvan
stanzas:
Azhagana Ratchashiyae Song Lyrics Mudhalvan
#ARRahman #SPB #Harini

Azhagaana ratchashiye
adi nenjil kudhikkuriye
muttaasu vaarthaiyile
pattaasu vedikkuriye
adi manasa aruvaamanaiyil
arukkuriye (2)

arugam pullukku
arukka theriyumaa
kuzhandha kumari
naan, aamaa.

aiyira meenuthaan
kokka muzhungumaa
adukkumaa

veliya poothu nee
ulla kaaikkira
kadal kaadu nee
aamaa

uyira urichi nee
kayira thirikkura
sugam sugamaa

kilye aalan kiliye
kuyile yaelan kuyile

Azhagaana ratchashiye
adi nenjil kudhikkuriye
adi manasa aruvaamanaiyil
arukkuriye

Sooriyana rendu thundu
senji kannil kondavalo
oho oho..

chandhirana kallukulla
ooravacha pennivalo
ohoo.

rathiriya getti getti
senja maiyidavo
ahaan ..

minminiya kannathula
ottavachi kaithattavo
oho.ho..

thurui enna thulachiputta
thookkam ippa dhooramaiyaa
tharaikku vachi naan padukka
azhuku vaeti thaarumaiyaa

thoongum thookkam kanavaa
kilye aalan kiliye
kuyile yaelan kuyile

Azhagaana ratchashiye
adi nenjil kudhikkuriye
muttaasu vaarthaiyile
pattaasu vedikkuriye
adi manasa aruvaamanaiyil
arukkuriye

thaenkootta pichi pichi
yechi vaikka
latchiyamaa ahaan oho

kadhal enna katchi
vittu katchi maarum
kaariyamaa oho ho..

onnu sonnaa thalakeezha
ukki poda mudiyumaa
ahaan oho..

naan nadakum nizhalukkul
nee vasikka sammadhamaa

neeraaga naan irundhaa
un nethiyila naan irangi
kooraana un nenjil
kudhichi anga kudi iruppen

aanaa veenaa ponen
kilye aalan kiliye
kuyile yaelan kuyile

Azhagaana ratchashiye
adi nenjil kudhikkuriye
muttaasu vaarthaiyile
pattaasu vedikkuriye
adi manasa aruvaamanaiyil
arukkuriye

arugam pullukku
arukka theriyumaa
kuzhandha kumari
naan, aamaa.

aiyira meenuthaan
kokka muzhungumaa
adukkumaa

veliya poothu nee
ulla kaaikkira
kadal kaadu nee
aamaa

uyira urichi nee
kayira thirikkura
sugam sugamaa
